ModMetaData.name: Adaptation Refusal
ModMetaData.author: Krantz86, milon
ModMetaData.description:
We refuse to adapt!!

This mod rejects peasant farming colonies in favor of new technologies. This allows the production of power, food, weapons, and armor using various metals.

Some sprites courtesy of SlimeCrusher and mrofa.
